title: I want to play with my freind's account to farm for him a 6300 champion and rengar but.....
body:
My freind doesn't play that much  lately and he wants some 6300 champs as he doesn't own them yet he is kind of new , so he asked me if i can farm them for him then i said no because i was afraid he gets banned for  ...hacked account ? 
is this risky or not i really need clear answer  and thank you guys.

replies.body: I know you want to help your friend, but this method is not a good idea!  We don't support account sharing, and doing so puts both you guys at risk for unauthorized access or other penalties.  Your best bet is to not do it!  If you want to gift your friend, use the[ gifting center](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752964-Gifting-Guide-and-FAQ) instead.  Let me know if you have any questions!
